responsibilities: Designed, implemented, and optimized scalable software solutions for multiple clients and internal projects at a growing tech startup, contributing as one of the key founding developers to the company's product portfolio.

Delivered high-quality custom solutions for external clients that resulted in a 25% increase in client retention, directly impacting business growth and establishing strong client relationships through technical excellence.

Assisted in the development of applications for the Research University Center (SIU) as a Programming Assistant in the Academic Stimulus Program at UdeA, focusing on backend development with Spring Boot.
Contributed to the implementation of cloud-based solutions using AWS to enhance system capabilities.
Provided technical support for network infrastructure and equipment, ensuring system operability and reliability.
Developed and deployed a web application using Next.js and JavaScript, integrating NextAuth for authentication and Prisma with PostgreSQL hosted on Vercel.
Implemented interactive data visualization features, including dynamic charts, tables, and filters for financial analysis.
Enabled data export capabilities in multiple formats, such as CSV, Excel, and PDF, enhancing user functionality.
Contributed to the development of an e-commerce platform for TripBoysGang, utilizing Next.js and TypeScript for the frontend and NestJS with PostgreSQL for the backend.
Managed containerization and deployment using Docker and Amazon EC2 for scalable application hosting.
Integrated Amazon S3 for high-resolution image storage and efficient asset management.
Contributed to the development of Devs Learning, an e-learning platform for online course sales, using React and TypeScript with Material-UI for the frontend.
Developed backend functionality with Node.js, Express, Sequelize, and PostgreSQL, ensuring efficient data handling.
Implemented state management with Redux and collaborated in an agile team environment.
Specialized in diagnosing telecommunications networks and maintaining equipment and servers during my internship as a Systems Technician.
Performed tasks such as fault identification, device configuration, and troubleshooting connectivity issues.
Conducted preventive and corrective maintenance to ensure optimal system performance.
